question: 政策
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>plan</kanji> made by the <kanji>government</kanji> is usually known as a <vocabulary>policy</vocabulary>. "The government passed a policy prohibiting the use of guns on zombies, dooming us all."
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
